modInfo.name: Mouse Tweaks
modInfo.description: Have you ever been tired of right clicking while crafting furnaces, chests or whatever? My client-side mod solves this problem! Just hold your right mouse button in one inventory slot and drag your mouse toward another. Also works with left mouse button! Credits: LiteLoader and some mods' source code, which I used as a reference to how to do certain stuff when I was unsure
